verses.text: God, \w you|strong="H1961"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* God. \w I|strong="H1961"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* earnestly seek \w you|strong="H1961"\w*. \w My|strong="H1732"\w* soul thirsts \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H1961"\w*. \w My|strong="H1732"\w* flesh longs \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H1961"\w*, \w in|strong="H3063"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dry \w and|strong="H3063"\w* weary land, where \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H1961"\w* water.

\w So|strong="H1097"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H4325"\w* seen \w you|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H4325"\w* sanctuary, watching \w your|strong="H5315"\w* power \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w your|strong="H5315"\w* glory.

\w Because|strong="H3651"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* loving kindness \w is|strong="H3651"\w* better than life, \w my|strong="H7200"\w* lips \w shall|strong="H5797"\w* praise \w you|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H2617"\w* bless \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w while|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H2617"\w* lift up \w my|strong="H3588"\w* hands \w in|strong="H2896"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* name.

\w My|strong="H5375"\w* soul \w shall|strong="H2416"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* satisfied \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w with|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* richest food. \w My|strong="H5375"\w* mouth \w shall|strong="H2416"\w* \w praise|strong="H1288"\w* \w you|strong="H1288"\w* \w with|strong="H3651"\w* joyful lips,

\w when|strong="H3644"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* remember \w you|strong="H3644"\w* \w on|strong="H6310"\w* \w my|strong="H5315"\w* bed, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* think \w about|strong="H1984"\w* \w you|strong="H3644"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* night watches.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w been|strong="H2142"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* help. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* will rejoice \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* shadow \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* wings.
\w My|strong="H1961"\w* soul stays close \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* right hand holds \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w up|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3225"\w* \w those|strong="H5315"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* seek \w my|strong="H8551"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H5315"\w* destroy \w it|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* go into \w the|strong="H8551"\w* lower parts \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H8551"\w* earth.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* given over \w to|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H1245"\w* power \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H1245"\w* sword. \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* jackal food.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H2719"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w*. Everyone who swears \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* praise \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* mouth \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* who speak \w lies|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H2719"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* silenced.
